links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
formula: a(n) = 6 - 3*(binomial(2*n,n) mod 2), with n>=0. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 11 2009a(n) = 3 + 3*sign(n). a(n) = 6, n > 0. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Nov 01 2013
prog: (PARI) allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 33000); x=contfrac(sqrt(10)); for (n=0, 20000, write("b040006.txt", n, " ", x[n+1])); \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 02 2009[6-3*(Binomial(2*n,n) mod 2): n in [0..100]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 03 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
